original_text:
Yet it was he who filled their houses with good things,
    so I stand aloof from the plans of the wicked.
korean_text: 하나님이 좋은 것으로 그들의 집에 채우셨느니라 악인의 계획은 나에게서 머니라

sentences.original_text: Yet it was he who filled their houses with good things
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그가 그들의 집을 좋은 것들로 채웠습니다

sentences.original_text: so I stand aloof from the plans of the wicked
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 악인들의 계획에서 벗어나 있습니다
